answers.answer: Watch those carbs in your diet. Maybe 60 per meal. As an aid read the nutrition labels.  Zero coke or pepsi only.See a registered dietician.
thank you, I will try that.Also, if it turns out that I have pre-diabetes, does it mean I will most likely end up with diabetes?

question: Ok so, for starters .. I have NOT yet been diagnosed with diabetes (I will have the results soon), but my doctor is pretty sure it is, and if not, it's pre-diabetes (type 1).If it's pre-diabetes, I was wondering if there is anything I can do to reverse it?I'm 18 years old, I eat fairly healthy ... I weigh about 110 pounds (I lost about 5 pounds) , and I'm about 5'5, so losing weight is not an option !Thank you
title: pre-diabetes
